content.text:
# 2014 AFC Annual Awards

| award1_type      = AFC Player of the Year
| award1_winner    = '''Men's: Nasser Al-Shamrani Women's:  Katrina Gorry
| award2_type      = AFC Coach of the Year
| award2_winner    = Men's: Tony Popovic Women's: Asako Takakura
| award3_type      = AFC Youth Player of the Year
| award3_winner    = Men's: Ahmed Moein Women's: Hina Sugita
| award4_type      = AFC International Player of the Year
| award4_winner    =  Mile Jedinak
| award5_type      = AFC Futsal Player of the Year
| award5_winner    =  Ali Asghar Hassanzadeh
| previous      = 2013
| main          = AFC Annual Awards
| next          =  2015
}}
The 2014 AFC Annual Awards''' was the fourth year for AFC's awards for the top football players and coaches of the year. The awards were given out in Manila on 30 November 2014.
External links
* [http://www.the-afc.com/en/events/afc-annual-awards Official page]
